data.message: Worst Em song ever! Seriously after hearing this I had to go listen to Marshal Mathers LP just to make me like him again! Woooh brought me back

replies.message: On voit que les americain ne connaissent pas jul fdp
Technically not a song. It's a spoken word freestyle. He has done a free recently. Look them up
Best way to understand it, is Google eminem cypher. You will get you answer to the difference between a song and spoken word freestyles 😊
Paskoela Fox lol ok not a “real “ fan sorry.

Let me say this, if u have to dissect a song and listen to the “lyrics “ and the beat (if there is one) is whack, the chorus is whack and sung by a hypocrite mind you, I don’t like it. It’s my opinion u don’t have to like it. I’ve been listening to Eminem since day 1, slim shady lp got me through a lot of hard times, I just don’t connect with his newer stuff. If that means I’m not a “real fan” than I guess I’m not.
your right its utter trash hes done nothing but feature in shitty pop songs and now he outputs this garbage style

Apparently some people here don't like real lyrics. I will agree the tune in this song doesn't match his energy though, but maybe that was the point... 🙃 to show the divide between melodys and lyrics.
Thanks for buying it and listen 🤣🤣🤣
